item.description: About me Currently, I’m doing my PhD in neurocognitive psychology at [Bar-Ilan University (Israel)] (https://www1.biu.ac.il/indexE.php) under the supervision and guidance of [Prof. Ruth Feldman] (https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Ruth_Feldman) from the [Interdisciplinary Center Herzliya (Israel)] (https://www.idc.ac.il/en/pages/home.aspx). In my PhD I look into how we synchronize to other people we’re interacting with through our autonomic measurements (e.g. heart rate, galvanic skin response), brain activity (using EEG), and hormones (mainly oxytocin, cortisol, testosterone). In addition to my research, I had the privilege to take part in other studies concerning mainly maternal depression, stressful environments, and PTSD.
